violations.description: Ensure role attribute has an appropriate value for the element
violations.help: ARIA role should be appropriate for the element

nodes.html: <ul role="navigation">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  ARIA role navigation is not allowed for given element

nodes.html: <ul role="navigation">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  ARIA role navigation is not allowed for given element

nodes.html: <ul role="navigation">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  ARIA role navigation is not allowed for given element

violations.description: Ensure elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes
violations.help: Required ARIA attributes must be provided

nodes.html: <input id="departureAirport" autocomplete="off" aria-owns="" aria-activedescendant="" aria-autocomplete="list" role="combobox" aria-expanded="true" aria-controls="" aria-invalid="false" value="">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Required ARIA attribute not present: aria-controls

nodes.html: <input id="arrivalAirport" autocomplete="off" aria-owns="" aria-activedescendant="" aria-autocomplete="list" role="combobox" aria-expanded="true" aria-controls="" aria-invalid="false" value="">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Required ARIA attribute not present: aria-controls

violations.description: Ensure all elements with a role attribute use a valid value
violations.help: ARIA roles used must conform to valid values

nodes.html: <div role="header">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix all of the following:
  Role must be one of the valid ARIA roles: header

violations.description: Ensure the contentinfo landmark is at top level
violations.help: Contentinfo landmark should not be contained in another landmark

nodes.html: <div class="footer-container" role="contentinfo">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The contentinfo landmark is contained in another landmark.

violations.description: Ensure the document has at most one contentinfo landmark
violations.help: Document should not have more than one contentinfo landmark

nodes.html: <footer role="contentinfo" class="footer-react">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Document has more than one contentinfo landmark

violations.help: Landmarks should have a unique role or role/label/title (i.e. accessible name) combination

nodes.html: <div class="col-sm-5 col-md-4 col-lg-4 pad0 page-header-items" role="navigation">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable

nodes.html: <footer role="contentinfo" class="footer-react">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  The landmark must have a unique aria-label, aria-labelledby, or title to make landmarks distinguishable

violations.description: Ensure <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming
violations.help: Zooming and scaling must not be disabled

nodes.html: <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0, user-scalable=no">
nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  user-scalable=no on <meta> tag disables zooming on mobile devices
